original: intros a l1 l2 H. inversion H. exists l1, l2. split. reflexivity. apply permutation_nil. - apply permutation_cons_ex_aux with (a:=a) in H2. destruct H2 as [l11 [l12 [H2 H3]]]. exists l11, l12. split. auto. apply H3. - apply permutation_app_comp in H3. apply permutation_cons_ex_aux with (a:=a) in H3. destruct H3 as [l13 [l14 [H3 H4]]]. exists l13, l14. split. auto. apply H4.
